###User Defined Function###
_WordDocGetCollection

###Description###
Returns a collection object containing all documents

###Syntax###
#include <Word.au3> 
_WordDocGetCollection ( ByRef $o_object [, $v_index = -1] )

###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
$o_object
	Object variable of a Word.Application object
$v_index
	<b>Optional:</b> Specifies whether to return a collection or indexed instance.
	-1 = (Default) Returns a collection
	0 = Returns the Active Document
	The document name or index number to return (1 based)
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
@@ReturnTable@@
Success:	Returns an object collection of all documents, @EXTENDED = document count
Failure:	Retuns 0  and sets @ERROR = 1
@Error:	0 ($_WordStatus_Success) = No Error
	3 ($_WordStatus_InvalidDataType) = Invalid Data Type
	4 ($_WordStatus_InvalidObjectType) = Invalid Object Type
	5 ($_WordStatus_InvalidValue) = Invalid Value
	7 ($_WordStatus_NoMatch) = No Match
@Extended:	Contains invalid parameter number
@@End@@


###Remarks###
None.


###Related###
None.
